name: df-phi
body: |- wceq(cphi, cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(chash, crab(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cgcd, cv(s0)), nat1)))))
comment: Define the Euler phi function (also called "Euler totient function"), which counts the number of integers less than ` n ` and coprime to it, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 25. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
